identity.mission: Create a high-performance, glass-morphic orchestration workspace that feels like a futuristic command center.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix tactical HUD aesthetics with glassmorphism.
Emotion First: Evoke control, precision, and depth.
Content is King: Data visibility is paramount.
Zoom In: Focus on metric details.
Negative Space: Use spacing to prevent clutter in dense grids.

universal_guidelines: ALWAYS use dark mode variables. No light mode toggles initially.
Use 'recharts' for data visualization in service cards.
Do not center-align the main dashboard; use a grid layout.
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds; use #09090b or darker zinc shades.
Ensure contrast ratios meet WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 for normal text).
Use ample padding (p-6, p-8) inside containers.
instructions_to_main_agent: Start by setting up the global dark theme in index.css. Create the layout wrapper with the glass sidebar. Then build the draggable dashboard grid. Use the provided background image as a fixed cover background for the entire app to give depth behind the glass panels.
